description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, and we're adding the "Flying Juliet" mini-game!
The power of love can overcome any distance. Both the distance of the heart and physical distance. Even if fate separates two people.
Oh Romeo, I feel your longing for me. I will come to you right away.
Lovers seek each other today as well, and they soar――
name: Additional mini-game "Flying Juliet"
